nodes.text: Outrider Squadron was a Squadron of 4 T-wings. They were providing fighter escort for an old Dreadnaught-class heavy cruiser Rahmat which was escorting a group of 3 BFF-1 bulk freighters Furlo. The Squadron had already engaged with Assault Gunboats from Tau Squadron, leaving only one left by the time Tan Maarek Stele arrived in a Missile Boat. Stele would engage and destroy both Outrider and Inrider Squadron that was launched from the Dreadnaught before the ship was also destroyed by Stele.
